Description: Dish (tondino-painted). Grotesque animals with stylised landscape of cypresses. Combat between striped lions and dragon. Tulips and rosettes. Made of black, cobalt, turquoise painted and glazed (crazed) ceramic, pottery.
Bibliographic references: Atasoy & Raby 1989 / Iznik: The Pottery of Ottoman Turkey (fig.539)
Lane 1957 / Later Islamic Pottery: Persia, Syria, Egypt, Turkey (fig.42.A)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Frederick Du Cane Godman
